pages.text: 6|102|vahee allaah tumhaara paalanahaar hai, usake atirikt koee sachcha poojy nahin. vah pratyek vastu ka utpattikaar hai. atah usakee ibaadat (vandana) karo tatha vahee pratyek cheez ka abhirakshak hai.
6|103|usaka, aankhen idraak nahin kar sakateen[1], jabakee vah sab kuchh dekh raha hai. vah atyant sookshmadarshee aur sab cheezon se avagat hai.

6|104|tumhaare paas nishaaniyaan aa chukee hain. to jisane samajh-boojh se kaam liya, usaka laabh usee ke lie hai aur jo andha ho gaya, to usakee haani useepar hai aur main tumapar sanrakshak[1] nahin hoon.

6|105|aur isee prakaar, ham anek shailiyon mein aayaton ka varnan kar rahe hain. taaki ve (kaafir) kahen ki aapane padh[1] liya hai aur taaki ham un logon ke lie (tarkon ko) ujaagar kar den, jo gyaan rakhate hain.
6|106|aap usapar chalen, jo aapapar aapake paalanahaar kee or se vahî€¼yee (prakaashana) kee ja rahee hai. usake siva koee saty poojy nahin hai aur mushrikon kee baaton par dhyaan na den.
6|107|aur yadi allaah chaahata, to vo log saajhee na banaate aur hamane aapako unapar nireekshak nahin banaaya hai aur na hee aap unapar[1] adhikaaree hain.

6|108|aur he eemaan vaalo! unhen bura na kaho, jin (moortiyon) ko ve allaah ke siva pukaarate hain. anyatha, ve log agyaanata ke kaaran ati karake allaah ko bura kahenge. isee prakaar, hamane pratyek samudaay ke lie unake karm ko sushobhit bana diya hai. phir unake paalanahaar kee or hee unhen jaana hai. to unhen bata dega, jo ve karate rahe.

6|109|aur un mushrikon ne balapoorvak shapathen leen ki yadi hamaare paas koee aayat (nishaanee) aa jaaye, to ham usapar avashy eemaan laayenge. aap kah den: aayaten (nishaaniyaan) to allaah hee ke paas hain aur (he eemaan vaalo!) tumhen kya pata ki vah nishaaniyaan jab aa jaayengee, to ve eemaan[1] nahin laayenge.
6|110|aur ham unake dilon aur aankhon ko aise hee pher[1] denge, jaise ve pahalee baar is (quraan) par eemaan nahin laaye aur ham unhen unake kukarmon mein bahakate chhod denge.
